summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Team page features for iteration 8. All backend API tests passed (12/12). Frontend Team page is fully functional with team member cards, Add Team Member modal with all required fields, and proper sidebar navigation.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/team-members returns team data (200 OK)
Backend: POST /api/team-members creates new team member with show_on_booking_page field
Backend: POST /api/team-members with show_on_booking_page=False works correctly
Backend: PATCH /api/team-members/{id} can update show_on_booking_page
Backend: POST /api/upload/avatar accepts JPEG images and returns URL
Backend: POST /api/upload/avatar rejects invalid file types (400)
Backend: POST /api/upload/avatar requires authentication (401)
Backend: GET /api/public/business/{id}/team returns visible team members
Backend: Public team endpoint filters out members with show_on_booking_page=False
Backend: Public team endpoint includes members with show_on_booking_page=True
Backend: Team member creation with all fields including avatar_url works
Backend: Team member avatar_url can be updated via PATCH
Frontend: Team page exists at /team and is accessible
Frontend: Sidebar shows Team navigation item between Bookings and Services
Frontend: Team page displays existing team members (Sarah Johnson, Michael Chen, Emma Wilson)
Frontend: Add Team Member button opens modal
Frontend: Modal contains avatar upload area
Frontend: Modal contains name input field
Frontend: Modal contains email input field
Frontend: Modal contains phone input field
Frontend: Modal contains role selector dropdown
Frontend: Modal contains color picker with 10 colors
Frontend: Modal contains Assigned Services section
Frontend: Modal contains Show on Booking Page toggle (enabled by default)
Frontend: Modal contains Save button
critical_code_review_comments: TeamPage.jsx is well-structured with proper state management and form handling
All interactive elements have appropriate data-testid attributes for testing
Backend team-members endpoints properly handle show_on_booking_page field
Public team endpoint correctly filters by show_on_booking_page=True
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - using existing team members (Sarah Johnson, Michael Chen, Emma Wilson)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Team page features fully tested and working. Backend has 12 new tests for team-members CRUD, avatar upload, and public team endpoint. Frontend Team page accessible via sidebar navigation, displays team member cards with avatar, name, role, email, visibility status, and calendar color. Add Team Member modal includes all required fields: avatar upload, name, email, phone, role selector, color picker, services assignment, and show_on_booking_page toggle. Test credentials: testuser@example.com / password123.

team_page_navigation.sidebar_position: Team is between Bookings and Services in sidebar

team_member_display.existing_members: Sarah Johnson, Michael Chen, Emma Wilson displayed
team_member_display.card_elements: Avatar, name, role, email, visibility status, calendar color shown

add_team_member_modal.trigger: Add Team Member button opens modal
add_team_member_modal.avatar_upload: Click to upload photo area present
add_team_member_modal.services: Assigned Services section with service selection
add_team_member_modal.visibility_toggle: Show on Booking Page toggle (default: enabled)
